{"id":1139060312,"question_id":3251,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1704595256,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"11 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1139060312/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Area of Longest Diagonal Rectangle","memory":"25.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int areaOfMaxDiagonal(vector<vector<int>>& dimensions) {\n        int ans=INT_MIN;\n        int x=INT_MIN;\n        for(int i=0;i<dimensions.size();i++){\n            double p=pow(dimensions[i][0],2)+pow(dimensions[i][1],2);\n            if(x<p){\n                x=p;\n                ans=dimensions[i][0]*dimensions[i][1];\n            }\n            if(x==p){\n                ans=max(ans,dimensions[i][0]*dimensions[i][1]);\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-area-of-longest-diagonal-rectangle","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
